Hey Tariq, please meet Thomas your incredible E-Mentor I've been telling you about :smile:.  Feel free to introduce yourselves, say a little bit about what you would like to get out of the mentorship and continue chatting within this channel. :wave:

I will now be leaving the channel, but please direct message myself or emma-prospela if you have any questions. All the best for now! :slightly_smiling_face:
_@dexter has left the channel_
_@dexter has left the channel_

Hi Thomas! So, I'm Tariq. I've recently graduated from a vfx in houdini course in Barcelona but I'm back in the UK now and keen to start work. I'd be very grateful for some insight on entering the industry.
Of course! Any Qs, hit them my way, and when I've got downtime at work I'll check and reply. Any insight into getting into the industry or Houdini Qs, fire them my way
Great thanks!

Well, I wanted to know if I should focus my reel in one area. I applied for the technicolor academy in Montreal and they told me that I should apply for CFX because I have a lot of Crowds in my Reel. I guess I'm a bit confused as to how the departments are separated

So crowds and CFX aren't really my area, I can ask someone at work a bit more about that area? From what I gather at our office it's: FX, Groom/CFX, and we also have the odd crowd job come in, which is usually someone else.
I think it depends what you want to do, or if you know what you want to do, or if it's just Houdini you want to work in
That would be great if you could! thanks. I'd like to eventually end up working near south Wales, probably Bristol. I'm worried that if I specialise in crowds or CFX I'd have to go to London

No problems. We have a lead Groom artist at work, and I think they know a bit about Crowds, but I'll also ask the senior FX artist at work, and see if they have any experience

And not particularly London, it depends what you're doing it for. We have Groom work at our Office in Bournemouth, and I know that some companies might move to Bristol for their offices, if it's more beneficial than London. So specializing in Crowd or CFX might not limit you to London
I did watch your reel and there is some good crowd stuff on there!
